text: So I am having issues with the boolean module. I created a boolean for a toggle of a featured image on a blog (with export to template context), and now when I go to the edit modules, the toggle simply has the word "Value" above it. Any idea how to change it to be an on off text?
<@U2H3TT8F2|ajlaporte> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/ajlaporte/F3F13BV9A/pasted_image_at_2016_12_14_03_38_pm.png|Pasted image at 2016-12-14, 3:38 PM>
It seems like this may be a bug in the UI for this module.
